meaning_str.bing:
n. 基础；基准；基点；方式
网络. 根据；基差；基底

基础；根底；底子；基准；基点；基本原则；基本方法；出发点；依据；根据；方式；模式；准则；原理；原因；要素；缘由

1.en: While net profits rose 14 per cent to $9. 4bn on a year-on-year basis, fourth quarter income was one-third that of the previous quarter.
1.cn: 尽管中行全年净利润同比增长14%，至94亿美元，但第四季度的收益却只相当于上一季度的三分之一。

2.en: Trying to discern an animal's thought processes on the basis of its behaviour is notoriously tricky and subjective at the best of times.
2.cn: 试图根据动物的行为洞悉它们的心理过程在情况最好的时候也是十分棘手且主观的。

3.en: Communication: Able to communicate with management or other business associates on a daily basis through emails, phone, fax, etc.
3.cn: 沟通能力：具备通过电子邮件、电话和传真等现代通讯手段与管理层或其他商业伙伴每天进行交流、沟通的能力。

0.en: Are you aware of any wiretaps that were in fact the undisclosed basis of this warrant?
0.cn: 你知道其实有窃听行为作为了这份证词的秘密基础吗？

1.en: Stories that had no basis in truth?
1.cn: 不是基于真实的故事吗？

2.en: Come on, now. How long have we known each other? We should be on a first-name basis. Better yet, a nickname basis, Vitamin D.
2.cn: 拜托，我们都认识对方多长时间了？我们应该直接用名字称呼对方的，或者直接叫昵称，维他命D。

3.en: Soaking your opponents on this grand scale has a religious basis.
3.cn: 这场声势浩大的互相泼水有一个虔诚的目标。

4.en: The basis of our myths. Gods among men upon our little blue planet here.
4.cn: 他们是神话故事的原型，人间之神，就在这个蓝色的星球上。

5.en: Yes, she is female. Yes, we communicate on a daily basis, but no, she is not my girlfriend.
5.cn: 没错，她是女性，没错，我们每天交流，但是，她不是我女朋友。

6.en: What can I say, you know? She enjoys my genitals. I am giving them to her on a nightly basis.
6.cn: 我能说什么呢？她很享受我的生殖器，我每天晚上都让她欲仙欲死。

7.en: Ice loss to the West Antarctic Ice Sheet has increased by a factor of three on a yearly basis since 2009.
7.cn: 西南极冰盖自2009年起，基于三个因素，每年融冰都增加。

8.en: Good, a polygraph can't be the sole basis for firing. So what? Cap my work off at five hours? Yeah. Okay.
8.cn: 一次测谎不能作为开除员工的唯一依据。那么，我这次有五个小时工时？行啊。好的。

9.en: On a day-to-day basis with this adoption? Who? Alicia. Alicia Florrick? When she worked at our firm? Yes.
9.cn: 领养案的日常管理由谁负责？哪位律师？艾丽西娅，艾丽西娅·福瑞克，当时她在我们律所上班。是的。

10.en: Your what? Well, here's a copy of our standard retainer agreement. Mrs. Sorrentino hired us on a contingency basis.
10.cn: 你们付出了什么？这是份正式聘用协议，我们对索伦蒂诺女士是按风险代理收费。

11.en: Sheldon, would you be prepared, on a non-precedential basis, to create an emergency ad hoc Slurpie-Icee equivalency?
11.cn: 谢尔顿，在此紧要关头，虽说没有先例吧，您能不能临时认同一下Slurpees等于刨冰？

12.en: At standard rates, that comes to $145,000. We're on a contingency basis, and our client doesn't have that kind of money.
12.cn: 按照我们的时薪，应该是14.5万美元。我们也是风险代理，我们的委托人可不会付那种钱。

13.en: Simple binary pings on an annual basis give us some clue as to which worlds have potential. And one system shows promise.
13.cn: 每年用简单的二进制方式进行分析我们得到了一些线索 哪些地方存在可能有一个很有希望的星系

14.en: I would love to be around for you and the baby. And we can just try it like on a temporary basis. But Ross, its you and me.
14.cn: 我很乐意照顾你跟宝宝，我们可试试看，先试一阵子。但那是你跟我。

15.en: I'm truly sorry for your loss. But you mustn't keep coming here on a daily basis. It doesn't help, and diverts time and resources from our investigation.
15.cn: 对您的遭遇，我深表同情。但您不能每天来我们这儿。您来这儿没有用，只会分散我们的注意力，影响我们调查。

16.en: Well, first of all, even though your chances of conceiving through natural means aren't great, you never know, so keep having sex on a regular basis. Oh, damn it!
16.cn: 虽然你们以正常方式受孕的几率很低，但是很难定论的，所以你们还是持续进行性生活。该死！

17.en: Starting this week, these travelers will be required to report their temperatures and any symptoms on a daily basis, for 21 days until we're confident they don't have Ebola.
17.cn: 从本周开始，这些旅客将被要求每天都报告他们的体温和出现的任何症状，并持续21天，直到我们有信心他们没有携带埃博拉病毒。
